name: personal-whiteboard-app
description: Personal whiteboard Teams app with presenter sharing capabilities

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true}); if(fs.existsSync('react-build')) fs.rmSync('react-build', {recursive: true, force: true});"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:react

author: Your Company
